Home Football

Take all the hassle out of your party and let Plunge+Co Café do all the work! Choose from a range of catering options.

They'll happily cater for special dietary requirements such as gluten free, dairy free, lactose free and will discuss your individual requirements with you. As all their menu items are prepared in kitchens using nuts and nut products, they unfortunately cannot guarantee nut free menus.

Please note, the café requires a minimum of 7 days notice for catering orders.

Platters

  • SANDWICH/WRAP PLATTER (20pc) $45 20 pieces of mixed sandwiches and wraps.
  • HOT MIX PLATTER (2opc) $35 20 pieces of mixed finger pies, finger sausage rolls, veggie spring rolls and mini quiches.
  • FRUIT PLATTER $45 Selection of freshly sliced seasonal fruit.
  • CHICKEN NUGGETS AND CHIPS PLATTER $35 1kg of chicken nuggets and a large bowl of chips.
  • MIXED FLAVOURS OF QUICHE PLATTER (15pc) $35
  • SWEET AND SAVOURY MUFFIN PLATTER (12pc) $35
  • CHEESE PLATTER $45 Dips, crackers and olives.
  • SUSHI PLATTER (36pc) $50 36 pieces of mix combination sushi

Party Boxes

  • Please note, that everyone at the party must have the same party box, we cannot mix and match.
  • ZEBRA PARTY BOX $15 pp Ham and cheese, small Smiths crisps, fruit and marshmallow skewer, lolly bag and juice box.
  • LION PARTY BOX $15 pp Cheese burger sliders or hotdogs, small hot chips, fruit and marshmallow skewer, lolly bag and juice box.
  • STARFISH PARTY BOX $15 pp Finger pie, finger sausage roll, small hot chips, fruit and marshmallow skewers, lolly bag and juice box.
  • CHOOK PARTY BOX $15 pp Five nuggets, small hot chips, fruit and marshmallow skewers, lolly bag and juice box.

Cockburn Nyungar moort Beeliar boodja-k kaadadjiny. Koora, yeyi, benang baalap nidja boodja-k kaaradjiny. Ngalak kaadatj dayin boodja, kep wer malayin. Ngalak kaadatj koora koora wer yeyi ngalang birdiya.

City of Cockburn acknowledges the Nyungar people of Beeliar boodja. Long ago, now and in the future they care for country. We acknowledge a continuing connection to land, waters and culture and pay our respects to the Elders, past, present and emerging.

Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people are warned that this website may contain images and voices of deceased persons.
